Code > Classes¶

Album¶

class genius.classes.album.Album(genius, data)[source]¶
Variables:
  • id (int) – id of the album.
  • artist (Artist) – artist of the album.
  • cover_art_url (str) – url of the album’s cover image.
  • name (str) – name of the album.
  • url (str) – url of the album in genius.

Artist¶

class genius.classes.artist.Artist(genius, data)[source]¶
Variables:
  • id (int) – id of the artist.
  • alternate_names* (list of str) – list of the artist’s alternative names.
  • description* (str) – information about the artist.
  • followers_count* (int) – amount of followers in genius.
  • header_image_url (str) – url of the artist’s header image.
  • image_url (str) – url of the artist’s image.
  • is_verified (bool) – flag to indicate if the artist was verified.
  • name (str) – name of the artist.
  • social_media* (dict of str:SocialMedia) – social media accounts of the artist.
  • url (str) – url of the artist in genius.
  • note – the attributes marked with a * will trigger one extra call to the api.
songs¶

Fetch all the songs of the artist sorted by title.

Yields:Song – Song of the artist.
songs_by_popularity¶

Fetch all the songs of the artist sorted by popularity.

Yields:Song – Song of the artist.

Media¶

class genius.classes.media.Media(genius, data)[source]¶
Variables:
  • provider (str) – provider of the media (youtube, spotify, etc.)
  • type (str) – media type (audio/video).
  • url (str) – url of the media.

SocialMedia¶

class genius.classes.social_media.SocialMedia(network, handle)[source]¶
Variables:
  • followers (int) – Amount of followers in the network.
  • handle (str) – username in the network.
  • network (str) – social media network (facebook, instagram, twitter, etc).
  • url (str) – url in the network.

Song¶

class genius.classes.song.Song(genius, data)[source]¶
Variables:
  • id (int) – id of the song.
  • album* (Album) – album of the song.
  • apple_music_id* (str) – id of the song in apple music.
  • artist (Artist) – primary artist of the song.
  • cover_of* (list of Song) – list of songs covered by the song.
  • covered_by* (list of Song) – list of songs that cover the song.
  • description* (str) – information about the song.
  • features* (list of Artist) – featured artists of the song.
  • hot (bool) – flag to indicate if the song is populare in genius.
  • interpolates* (list of Song) – list of songs interpolated by the song.
  • interpolated_by* (list of Song) – list of songs that interpole the song.
  • is_cover* (bool) – flag to indicate if the song is a cover.
  • is_live* (bool) – flag to indicate if the song is a live performance.
  • is_remix* (bool) – flag to indicate if the song is a remix.
  • media* (dict of str:Media) – collection of multimedia related to the song.
  • pageviews (int) – amount of page views of the song in genius.
  • producers* (list of Artist) – producers of the song.
  • recording_location* (str) – location where the song was recorded.
  • release_date* (datetime) – released date of the song.
  • release_date_for_display* (str) – formated released date “(MMM DD, YYYY)”.
  • remix_of* (list of Song) – list of songs remixed in th song.
  • remixed_by* (list of Song) – list of songs that remixed the song.
  • samples* (list of Song) – list of songs sampled in the song.
  • sampled_in* (list of Song) – list of songs that sampled the song.
  • live_version_of* (list of Song) – list of songs that are a studio version of the song.
  • performed_live_as* (list of Song) – list of songs that a live performance of the song.
  • song_art_image_url (str) – url of the songs’s art image.
  • title (str) – title of the song.
  • title_with_featured (str) – title of the song including featured artists.
  • url (str) – url of the song in genius.
  • writers* (list of Artist) – writers of the song.
  • note – the attributes marked with a * will trigger one extra call to the api.
lyrics¶

Fetch the lyrics of the song using a scrapper.

Returns:Lines of the lyrics.
Return type:list of str
